import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ThemeService } from '../theme.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { currentTheme: string; constructor(private themeService: ThemeService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.themeService.currentTheme$.subscribe(theme => { this.currentTheme = theme; // Perform any necessary actions based on the updated theme }); } }
